name: Meteor Storm - Ludum Dare 50
description:
Meteor Storm is a short and hectic sci-fi metoer wave spawner with the goal of surviving as long as possible.

Controls: Active the burners with your Arrows or WASD 

Meteor Storm was made for the Ludum Dare 50 game jam.

Game Jam Theme: Delay the inevitable

Ludum Dare submission page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/meteor-storm
